sentence: The US markets are higher this afternoon, with the Dow up 0.09%, the S&P up 0.32% and the Nasdaq higher by 0.76% so far today.
Some of the most actively traded stocks include Facebook ( FB ) up 1.17%, Bank of America ( BAC ) higher by 1.1%, Zynga ( ZNGA ) up 4.18% and AstraZeneca ( AZN ) down 11.5%.
Good afternoon, this is Kristin Bianco with the Week Ahead Market Report for May 19, 2014.
In overseas trading, Japan's Nikkei 225 Stock Average was down 0.64%, and the Hang Seng was lower by 0.04%.
In Europe on Monday, the FTSE 100 was lower by 0.16% and the German DAX was up 0.31% today.
In economic news, Initial Claims, Existing Home Sales, and Leading Indicators are released on Thursday.
New Home Sales comes out Friday.
Many earnings releases this week including: Home Depot ( HD ) on Tuesday, Eaton Vance (EV) on Wednesday, and Gap (GPS) and Sears Holdings (SHLD) on Thursday.
Join us on Friday for the Weekly Market Wrap and have a wonderful week.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
